name: Masquerade
author: Soreile
desc:
You hastily assemble a magically convincing disguise that obscures your normal clothing and appearance, but not your overall shape, species, or build.

Creatures can't recognize you without a Knowledge saving throw, unless you give yourself away. You have advantage on Willpower saving throws to deceive creatures with your words.

Creatures that observe you casting this spell are completely unaffected.
